General.Name: Beijing Shouhang Resources Saving Co Ltd
General.Description: Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of power station air-cooling systems in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It also involved in the solar thermal power generation and storage, energy storage technology, waste heat utilization, waste heat power generation, clean heating, seawater desalination, and hydrogen energy utilization. The company was formerly known as Beijing Shouhang Resources Saving Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. in December 2019. Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
